column2: "I've been waiting! I'm not great with scary things, but for the sake of the event... OK, show me what you've got!"
"Wow, it's like something right out of a nightmare... There's scary faces all over its body, and they're flying around like ghosts..."
"This is almost too scary... This sense of fear is incredible. Oh, thank you!"
"Ooh... I'll have to do my best to make this the scariest costume it can be!"
"Heheh, I can't wait to see the terrified looks on everyone's faces! Look forward to seeing it in action!"

"すっごいいっぱい敵が現れたって
聞いてたけど、ぜーんぶ貴方が
追い払ってくれたんだってね。"

"これでイベントも開催できるし
ピリピリした空気もなくなって
ひと安心だよー。"

"これも全部、貴方がたっくさん
手伝ってくれたおかげだね。
感謝してもしきれないよ、ありがとう！"
